name: meditative
content:

involving meditation (= giving your attention to one thing as a religious activity or to relax): She closed her eyes and went into a meditative trance. For a few moments, the two men sat in meditative silence.
involving serious thought or study: His new book is a meditative memoir about losing his partner. She finds the repetitive, physical work very meditative. See
meditation
